description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国音乐教育家，中央音乐学院音乐教育系第一任系主任，前中华人民共和国副主席李源潮的夫人。
description.en: A music educator from the People's Republic of China, the first head of the Music Education Department at the Central Conservatory of Music, and the wife of former Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Li Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的音乐学院，是中国艺术院校中唯一一所国家重点大学和“211工程”建设院校。
description.en: A conservatory in Beijing, China. It is the only national key university and 'Project 211' institution among art academies in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的著名中学。
description.en: A renowned high school located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的音乐学院。
description.en: A conservatory of music located in Shanghai, China.

en: Affiliated Middle School of the Central Conservatory of Music

description.zh-cn: 中央音乐学院附属的中等音乐专科学校。
description.en: The secondary music school affiliated with the Central Conservatory of Music.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的师范大学。
description.en: A normal university located in Nanjing, Jiangsu province, China.

description.zh-cn: 由德国作曲家卡尔·奥尔夫创立的一种综合性音乐教育体系。
description.en: A comprehensive music education approach developed by the German composer Carl Orff.

description.zh-cn: 一种由瑞士音乐家埃米尔·雅克-达克罗士创立的音乐教育方法，强调通过身体运动来感受和表达音乐。
description.en: A music education method developed by the Swiss musician Émile Jaques-Dalcroze, which emphasizes experiencing and expressing music through body movement.

description.zh-cn: 一种由匈牙利作曲家高大宜·佐尔坦创立的音乐教育方法，强调以歌唱为基础。
description.en: A music education approach developed by the Hungarian composer Zoltán Kodály, which is based on singing.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在表彰在中国音乐教育领域做出杰出贡献的教育工作者的奖项。
description.en: An award aimed at recognizing educators who have made outstanding contributions to the field of music education in China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language work.

description.zh-cn: 由宝钢教育基金会设立，旨在奖励优秀人才，推动教育发展的奖项。
description.en: An award established by the Baosteel Education Foundation aimed at rewarding outstanding talents and promoting educational development.

en: Member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局的组成人员，是中国共产党的领导核心成员。
description.en: The members of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who are the core leading members of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 高建进与李源潮之子。
description.en: The son of Gao Jianjin and Li Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 高建进是李源潮的夫人。
description.en: Gao Jianjin is the wife of Li Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 李海进是高建进的儿子。
description.en: Li Haijin is the son of Gao Jianjin.

description.zh-cn: 李海进是李源潮的儿子。
description.en: Li Haijin is the son of Li Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 高建进是中华人民共和国的音乐教育家。
description.en: Gao Jianjin is a music educator of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 高建进于1967年毕业于上海市南洋模范中学。
description.en: Gao Jianjin graduated from Shanghai Nanyang Model High School in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 高建进于1979年毕业于上海音乐学院音乐研究室西方音乐史专业。
description.en: Gao Jianjin graduated from the Western Music History program at the Music Research Department of the Shanghai Conservatory of Music in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 高建进于1979年毕业后留校任教。
description.en: After graduating in 1979, Gao Jianjin stayed at the Shanghai Conservatory of Music to teach.

description.zh-cn: 高建进曾任中央音乐学院附中理论学科主任。
description.en: Gao Jianjin once served as the Director of Theoretical Subjects at the Affiliated Middle School of the Central Conservatory of Music.

position.zh-cn: 音乐学系音乐教育教研组长
position.en: Head of the Music Education Teaching and Research Group of the Musicology Department

description.zh-cn: 高建进于1998年出任中央音乐学院音乐学系音乐教育教研组长。
description.en: In 1998, Gao Jianjin became the Head of the Music Education Teaching and Research Group of the Musicology Department at the Central Conservatory of Music.

position.zh-cn: 音乐教育系第一任系主任
position.en: First Head of the Music Education Department

description.zh-cn: 自1999年起，高建进担任中央音乐学院音乐教育系第一任系主任。
description.en: Since 1999, Gao Jianjin has served as the first Head of the Music Education Department at the Central Conservatory of Music.

position.zh-cn: 音乐教育系教授、博士生导师
position.en: Professor and Doctoral Supervisor of the Music Education Department

description.zh-cn: 高建进是中央音乐学院音乐教育系教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Gao Jianjin is a professor and doctoral supervisor in the Music Education Department at the Central Conservatory of Music.

description.zh-cn: 高建进是南京师范大学特聘教授。
description.en: Gao Jianjin is a distinguished professor at Nanjing Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央音乐学院音乐教育系的学科带头人，高建进系统引进了奥尔夫等国际三大音乐教育体系。
description.en: As the academic leader of the Music Education Department at the Central Conservatory of Music, Gao Jianjin systematically introduced the Orff method and two other major international music education systems.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央音乐学院音乐教育系的学科带头人，高建进系统引进了达克罗士等国际三大音乐教育体系。
description.en: As the academic leader of the Music Education Department at the Central Conservatory of Music, Gao Jianjin systematically introduced the Dalcroze method and two other major international music education systems.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央音乐学院音乐教育系的学科带头人，高建进系统引进了高大宜等国际三大音乐教育体系。
description.en: As the academic leader of the Music Education Department at the Central Conservatory of Music, Gao Jianjin systematically introduced the Kodály method and two other major international music education systems.

description.zh-cn: 高建进于2005年获得“区永熙音乐教育奖”。
description.en: Gao Jianjin received the 'Au Wing-hee Music Education Award' in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 高建进于2008年获得“宝钢教育奖”。
description.en: Gao Jianjin received the 'Baosteel Education Award' in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮曾任中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Li Yuanchao formerly served as a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 李源潮曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Li Yuanchao formerly served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.
